scripts.say: Acasta, now's not the time for a nap. We're supposed to be escorting a convoy.
I know, you don't have to spell it out... Blame the weather, it's making me sleepy...
*Sigh*... Of course, it's always the weather...
Ahah, it's all right. As long as we maintain a basic level of vigilance, we'll be fine. And if anyone tries to attack us, my planes will send them away~
Thanks, Glorious! In any event, we must still do our jobs. And Acasta, since we don't have radar with us, you should move to the front so we can spot enemies quicker.
All right. Glorious is moving at 17 knots; wind force is around 2 or 3, moving southeast... We've got good visibility... And I think we're behind schedule, but we're making good progress...
Hold up... Non-allied vessels are approaching... Oh, dear... they're Iron Blood!
I let my guard down, and we're not in combat formation... Ardent, count the number of approaching Iron Blood ships! Acasta, to my right! Zig-zag and keep an eye out for enemy submarines!
